name: They Scream for Ice Cream
description:
You play as an ice cream truck driver, and you have to launch ice cream at the children before time runs out!

Controls:
w a s d to move
R to reload
Left-click to launch ice cream
ESC to pause

I made this for the weekly game jam week 187 - but I misread the date that they were posted and thought that was for this week. I completed the game in three days, which is cool, also had lots of fun making it.

Credits:

Design, Art, Building, Modeling, Texturing, Writing: Vintage Japes
